additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Citrate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Xylenesulfonate, Stearyl Alcohol, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cetyl Alcohol, Fragrance, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Polyquaternium-6, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Tetrasodium EDTA, Trihydroxystearin, Panthenol, Panthenyl Ethyl Ether, Histidine, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: If in eyes wash out immediately with water.
